entity.description: Top level of the Microsoft Dynamics 365 business hierarchy. The organization can be a specific business, holding company, or corporation.

attributes.name: organizationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the organization. The name is set when Microsoft CRM is installed and should not be changed.

attributes.name: recurrenceExpansionJobBatchSize
attributes.description: Specifies the value for number of instances created in on demand job in one shot.
attributes.displayName: Recurrence Expansion On Demand Job Batch Size

attributes.name: recurrenceExpansionJobBatchInterval
attributes.description: Specifies the interval (in seconds) for pausing expansion job.

attributes.name: fiscalPeriodType
attributes.description: Type of fiscal period used throughout Microsoft CRM.

attributes.name: dateFormatCode
attributes.description: Information about how the date is displayed throughout Microsoft CRM.

attributes.name: timeFormatCode
attributes.description: Information that specifies how the time is displayed throughout Microsoft CRM.

attributes.name: weekStartDayCode
attributes.description: Designated first day of the week throughout Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: fullNameConventionCode
attributes.description: Order in which names are to be displayed throughout Microsoft CRM.

items.displayName: First Name, Middle Name, Last Name
Last Name, no space, First Name
Last Name, First Name, Middle Initial
First Name, Middle Initial, Last Name
Last Name, First Name, Middle Name

attributes.name: negativeFormatCode
attributes.description: Information that specifies how negative numbers are displayed throughout Microsoft CRM.

attributes.name: fiscalYearPeriodConnect
attributes.description: Information that specifies how the names of the fiscal year and the fiscal period should be connected when displayed together.

attributes.name: pricingDecimalPrecision
attributes.description: Number of decimal places that can be used for prices.

attributes.name: tagMaxAggressiveCycles
attributes.description: Maximum number of aggressive polling cycles executed for email auto-tagging when a new email is received.

attributes.name: allowOutlookScheduledSyncs
attributes.description: Indicates whether scheduled synchronizations to Outlook are allowed.

attributes.name: allowMarketingEmailExecution
attributes.description: Indicates whether marketing emails execution is allowed.

attributes.name: currencyFormatCode
attributes.description: Information about how currency symbols are placed throughout Microsoft Dynamics CRM.

attributes.name: fiscalSettingsUpdated
attributes.description: Information that specifies whether the fiscal settings have been updated.

attributes.name: shareToPreviousOwnerOnAssign
attributes.description: Information that specifies whether to share to previous owner on assign.
attributes.displayName: Share To Previous Owner On Assign

attributes.name: minOutlookSyncInterval
attributes.description: Minimum allowed time between scheduled Outlook synchronizations.

attributes.name: bulkOperationPrefix
attributes.description: Prefix used for bulk operation numbering.

attributes.name: campaignPrefix
attributes.description: Prefix used for campaign numbering.

attributes.name: fiscalYearDisplayCode
attributes.description: Information that specifies whether the fiscal year should be displayed based on the start date or the end date of the fiscal year.

attributes.name: ignoreInternalEmail
attributes.description: Indicates whether incoming email sent by internal Microsoft Dynamics 365 users or queues should be tracked.

attributes.name: tagPollingPeriod
attributes.description: Normal polling frequency used for email receive auto-tagging in outlook.

attributes.name: longDateFormatCode
attributes.description: Information that specifies how the Long Date format is displayed in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: currentImportSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Import sequence to use.

attributes.name: parsedTablePrefix
attributes.description: Prefix used for parsed tables.

attributes.name: isFiscalPeriodMonthBased
attributes.description: Indicates whether the fiscal period is displayed as the month number.

attributes.name: localeId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the locale of the organization.

attributes.name: parsedTableColumnPrefix
attributes.description: Prefix used for parsed table columns.

attributes.name: AMDesignator
attributes.description: AM designator to use throughout Microsoft Dynamics CRM.

attributes.name: currencyDisplayOption
attributes.description: Indicates whether to display money fields with currency code or currency symbol.

attributes.name: minAddressBookSyncInterval
attributes.description: Normal polling frequency used for address book synchronization in Microsoft Office Outlook.

attributes.name: isDuplicateDetectionEnabledForOnlineCreateUpdate
attributes.description: Indicates whether duplicate detection during online create or update is enabled.
attributes.displayName: Is Duplicate Detection Enabled for Online Create/Update

attributes.name: isDuplicateDetectionEnabledForOfflineSync
attributes.description: Indicates whether duplicate detection of records during offline synchronization is enabled.
attributes.displayName: Is Duplicate Detection Enabled For Offline Synchronization

attributes.name: allowOfflineScheduledSyncs
attributes.description: Indicates whether background offline synchronization in Microsoft Office Outlook is allowed.

attributes.name: allowUnresolvedPartiesOnEmailSend
attributes.description: Indicates whether users are allowed to send email to unresolved parties (parties must still have an email address).

attributes.name: currentParsedTableNumber
attributes.description: First parsed table number to use.

attributes.name: minOfflineSyncInterval
attributes.description: Normal polling frequency used for background offline synchronization in Microsoft Office Outlook.

attributes.name: allowWebExcelExport
attributes.description: Indicates whether Web-based export of grids to Microsoft Office Excel is allowed.

attributes.name: isDuplicateDetectionEnabledForImport
attributes.description: Indicates whether duplicate detection of records during import is enabled.
attributes.displayName: Is Duplicate Detection Enabled For Import

attributes.name: negativeCurrencyFormatCode
attributes.description: Information that specifies how negative currency numbers are displayed throughout Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: allowAddressBookSyncs
attributes.description: Indicates whether background address book synchronization in Microsoft Office Outlook is allowed.

attributes.name: ISVIntegrationCode
attributes.description: Indicates whether loading of Microsoft Dynamics 365 in a browser window that does not have address, tool, and menu bars is enabled.

attributes.name: decimalSymbol
attributes.description: Symbol used for decimal in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: maxUploadFileSize
attributes.description: Maximum allowed size of an attachment.

attributes.name: isAppMode
attributes.description: Indicates whether loading of Microsoft Dynamics 365 in a browser window that does not have address, tool, and menu bars is enabled.

attributes.name: enablePricingOnCreate
attributes.description: Enable pricing calculations on a Create call.

attributes.name: isSOPIntegrationEnabled
attributes.description: Enable sales order processing integration.

attributes.name: PMDesignator
attributes.description: PM designator to use throughout Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: currencyDecimalPrecision
attributes.description: Number of decimal places that can be used for currency.

attributes.name: maxAppointmentDurationDays
attributes.description: Maximum number of days an appointment can last.

attributes.name: emailSendPollingPeriod
attributes.description: Normal polling frequency used for sending email in Microsoft Office Outlook.

attributes.name: renderSecureIFrameForEmail
attributes.description: Flag to render the body of email in the Web form in an IFRAME with the security='restricted' attribute set. This is additional security but can cause a credentials prompt.

attributes.name: numberSeparator
attributes.description: Symbol used for number separation in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: maxRecordsForExportToExcel
attributes.description: Maximum number of records that will be exported to a static Microsoft Office Excel worksheet when exporting from the grid.

attributes.name: yearStartWeekCode
attributes.description: Information that specifies how the first week of the year is specified in Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: isDuplicateDetectionEnabled
attributes.description: Indicates whether duplicate detection of records is enabled.

attributes.name: expireSubscriptionsInDays
attributes.description: Maximum number of days before deleting inactive subscriptions.

attributes.name: isAuditEnabled
attributes.description: Enable or disable auditing of changes.

attributes.name: baseCurrencyPrecision
attributes.description: Number of decimal places that can be used for the base currency.

attributes.name: baseCurrencySymbol
attributes.description: Symbol used for the base currency.

attributes.name: maxRecordsForLookupFilters
attributes.description: Maximum number of lookup and picklist records that can be selected by user for filtering.

attributes.name: allowEntityOnlyAudit
attributes.description: Indicates whether auditing of changes to entity is allowed when no attributes have changed.

attributes.name: futureExpansionWindow
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum number of months in future for which the recurring activities can be created.

attributes.name: pastExpansionWindow
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum number of months in past for which the recurring activities can be created.

attributes.name: recurrenceExpansionSynchCreateMax
attributes.description: Specifies the maximum number of instances to be created synchronously after creating a recurring appointment.

attributes.name: recurrenceDefaultNumberOfOccurrences
attributes.description: Specifies the default value for number of occurrences field in the recurrence dialog.

attributes.name: getStartedPaneContentEnabled
attributes.description: Indicates whether Get Started content is enabled for this organization.
attributes.displayName: Is Get Started Pane Content Enabled

attributes.name: useReadForm
attributes.description: Indicates whether the read-optimized form should be enabled for this organization.

attributes.name: reportScriptErrors
attributes.description: Picklist for selecting the organization preference for reporting scripting errors.

items.displayName: No preference for sending an error report to Microsoft about Microsoft Dynamics 365
Ask me for permission to send an error report to Microsoft
Automatically send an error report to Microsoft without asking me for permission
Never send an error report to Microsoft about Microsoft Dynamics 365

attributes.name: requireApprovalForUserEmail
attributes.description: Indicates whether Send As Other User privilege is enabled.
attributes.displayName: Is Approval For User Email Required

attributes.name: requireApprovalForQueueEmail
attributes.description: Indicates whether Send As Other User privilege is enabled.
attributes.displayName: Is Approval For Queue Email Required

attributes.name: goalRollupExpiryTime
attributes.description: Number of days after the goal's end date after which the rollup of the goal stops automatically.

attributes.name: goalRollupFrequency
attributes.description: Number of hours between automatic rollup jobs .

attributes.name: autoApplyDefaultonCaseCreate
attributes.description: Select whether to auto apply the default customer entitlement on case creation.
attributes.displayName: Auto Apply Default Entitlement on Case Create

attributes.name: autoApplyDefaultonCaseUpdate
attributes.description: Select whether to auto apply the default customer entitlement on case update.
attributes.displayName: Auto Apply Default Entitlement on Case Update

attributes.name: discountCalculationMethod
attributes.description: Discount calculation method for the QOOI product.

attributes.name: allowClientMessageBarAd
attributes.description: Indicates whether Outlook Client message bar advertisement is allowed.
attributes.displayName: Allow Outlook Client Message Bar Advertisement

attributes.name: allowUserFormModePreference
attributes.description: Indicates whether individuals can select their form mode preference in their personal options.

attributes.name: isUserAccessAuditEnabled
attributes.description: Enable or disable auditing of user access.

attributes.name: userAccessAuditingInterval
attributes.description: The interval at which user access is checked for auditing.

attributes.name: quickFindRecordLimitEnabled
attributes.description: Indicates whether a quick find record limit should be enabled for this organization (allows for faster Quick Find queries but prevents overly broad searches).

attributes.name: enableBingMapsIntegration
attributes.description: Enable Integration with Bing Maps

attributes.name: isDefaultCountryCodeCheckEnabled
attributes.description: Enable or disable country code selection.
attributes.displayName: Enable or disable country code selection

attributes.name: useSkypeProtocol
attributes.description: Indicates default protocol selected for organization.

attributes.name: emailCorrelationEnabled
attributes.description: Flag to turn email correlation on or off.

attributes.name: emailConnectionChannel
attributes.description: Select if you want to use the Email Router or server-side synchronization for email processing.

attributes.name: isAutoSaveEnabled
attributes.description: Information on whether auto save is enabled.

attributes.name: generateAlertsForErrors
attributes.description: Indicates whether alerts will be generated for errors.

attributes.name: generateAlertsForInformation
attributes.description: Indicates whether alerts will be generated for information.

attributes.name: generateAlertsForWarnings
attributes.description: Indicates whether alerts will be generated for warnings.

attributes.description: Indicates whether mailbox owners will be notified of email server profile level alerts.
attributes.displayName: Notify Mailbox Owner Of Email Server Level Alerts

attributes.name: maxProductsInBundle
attributes.description: Restrict the maximum no of items in a bundle

attributes.name: OOBPriceCalculationEnabled

attributes.name: isHierarchicalSecurityModelEnabled

attributes.name: maximumDynamicPropertiesAllowed

attributes.name: usePositionHierarchy

attributes.description: The maximum version of IE to run browser emulation for in Outlook client

attributes.name: globalHelpUrlEnabled

attributes.description: Enable Initial state of newly created products to be Active instead of Draft

attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.description: Information on whether IM presence is enabled.

attributes.name: defaultRecurrenceEndRangeType
attributes.description: Type of default recurrence end range date.

attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the organization.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the organization.

attributes.name: initialVersion
attributes.description: Initial version of the organization.

attributes.description: Unique identifier of the sample data import job.

attributes.description: Prefix for the display of the fiscal year.

attributes.description: Suffix for the display of the fiscal year.

attributes.name: fiscalYearFormatYear
attributes.description: Format for the year.

attributes.name: fiscalPeriodFormatPeriod
attributes.description: Format in which the fiscal period will be displayed.

attributes.name: hashFilterKeywords
attributes.description: Filter Subject Keywords

attributes.name: hashMaxCount
attributes.description: Maximum number of subject keywords or recipients used for correlation

attributes.name: hashDeltaSubjectCount
attributes.description: Maximum difference allowed between subject keywords count of the email messaged to be correlated

attributes.name: hashMinAddressCount
attributes.description: Minimum number of recipients required to match for email messaged to be correlated

attributes.name: enableSmartMatching
attributes.description: Use Smart Matching.

attributes.name: orgDbOrgSettings
attributes.description: Organization settings stored in Organization Database.

attributes.name: defaultCountryCode
attributes.description: Text area to enter default country code.

attributes.name: incomingEmailExchangeEmailRetrievalBatchSize
attributes.description: Setting for the Async Service Mailbox Queue. Defines the retrieval batch size of exchange server.

attributes.name: yammerOAuthAccessTokenExpired
attributes.description: Denotes whether the OAuth access token for Yammer network has expired

attributes.name: defaultEmailSettings
attributes.description: XML string containing the default email settings that are applied when a user or queue is created.

attributes.name: yammerGroupId
attributes.description: Denotes the Yammer group ID

attributes.name: yammerNetworkPermalink
attributes.description: Denotes the Yammer network permalink

attributes.name: yammerPostMethod

attributes.name: defaultEmailServerProfileId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the default email server profile.

attributes.name: bingMapsApiKey
attributes.description: Api Key to be used in requests to Bing Maps services.

attributes.name: entityImageId
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: cascadeStatusUpdate
attributes.description: Flag to cascade Update on incident.

attributes.name: restrictStatusUpdate
attributes.description: Flag to restrict Update on incident.

attributes.name: socialInsightsTermsAccepted
attributes.description: Flag for whether the organization has accepted the Social Insights terms of use.

attributes.name: socialInsightsInstance

attributes.name: slaPauseStates
attributes.description: Contains the on hold case status values.

attributes.name: socialInsightsEnabled
attributes.description: Flag for whether the organization is using Social Insights.

attributes.name: globalHelpUrl
attributes.description: URL for the web page global help.

attributes.name: KMSettings
attributes.description: XML string containing the Knowledge Management settings that are applied in Knowledge Management Wizard.

attributes.name: sharePointDeploymentType
attributes.description: Indicates which SharePoint deployment type is configured for Server to Server. (Online or On-Premises)

attributes.name: organizationState
attributes.description: Indicates the organization lifecycle state

attributes.name: defaultThemeData
attributes.description: Default theme data for the organization.

attributes.name: privacyStatementUrl
attributes.description: Privacy Statement URL

attributes.name: highContrastThemeData
attributes.description: High contrast theme data for the organization.

attributes.name: delegatedAdminUserId
